long_description: Whether you're backpacking the high plains or hiking at high altitude, the self-inflating REI AirRail 1.5 women's sleeping pad is lightweight and takes up little space in your backpack. Women-specific design helps you stay warm with increased insulation in torso area-a key heat-loss area for women-and extra padding in hip area. Pad features a die-cut foam center panel and full length, raised tubes on the outside (insulated with PrimaLoft(R) synthetic down microfiber) to keep you from rolling off. Foam insulation is cross-cored and engineered to be lightweight, compressible and stable. Quick-closing, high-volume airflow valve allows the pad to inflate and deflate quickly. 75-denier polyester construction with a hexagonal embossed surface provides durability and a nonslip surface; 75-denier polyester bottom resists wear. REI AirRail 1.5 sleeping pad has a fully welded construction that's leakproof and durable. Low-volume, tapered, mummy-shape design increases efficiency and compressibility. R-value equals 4.2; R-value is the measurement of resistance to the flow of heat through a material; the higher the R-value, the greater the insulation provided. Included stuff sack protects pad during transport and ensures a compact parcel every time.
